Translations.Text: Ntawuzo winjira mwo atari umuntu mubi
Ariwe ahakana n’ukuyiha umugongo iyi dini y’ukuri
Nuwu	gamburukira	Imana	yiwe	y’ukuri	azokingirwa	nuwo	muriro udahera
Uwutanga amatungo yiwe kugira ngo yisukure
Mugihe ata n’umwe yamugiriye ineza kugira ngo abe aramuriha iyo neza
Atari ukurondera impuhwe z’Umuremyi wiwe mutagatifu
Rero azoronka ikizo muhumuriza
Ndarahiye k’Umutaga
No kw’Ijoro riba rikwiragiye hose
Ntiyagusize Umuremyi wawe, canke ntiyashavuye
Ntankeka mugihe kiza kizoba ari ciza kuri wewe gusumba icabaye
N’Umuremyi wawe azoguha vyinshi kugeza aho uzoshima
Mbega nti yagusanze uri impfuvyi ica iguha uburaro n’uburamuko bwiza
Igusanga utazi kurongora inzira nayo irakurongora
Igusanga uri umukene iguha n’ubutunzi
Rero ntubonere impfuvyi
Kandi ntukankamire uwukubajije
N’imigisha y’Umuremyi wawe uyivuge
Mbega ntitwakwaguriye igikiriza cawe
Nukugukurira uburemere bwawe wari ufise
Bwavunye umugongo wawe
Nukuguhayagiza kukuvurwa kwawe
Rero mu vy’ukuri hamwe n’ingorane, haraboneka agahengwe
Mu vy’ukuri hamwe n’ingorane, haraboneka agahengwe
Niwaheza	gushikiriza	ubutumwa	bwawe,	n’ubandaye	n’amasengesho yawe
Kandi wiyegereze cane ku Muremyi wawe
